title: New: Delaire – Hey You.
body:
Some really slick pop songwriting here from London’s **Delaire** – think Shura, Jack Garratt and HONNE, and you’re in the right ballpark.

With a host of festival appearances this summer, and more releases expected later in the year – it’s worth getting on board with Delaire now. Check out _Hey You._ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
